main.title: a concrete structure
main.body: the main entrance has been sealed with a metal door, but the thick concrete walls are covered in cracks and holes, allowing for easy entrance.

office.title: an office
office.body: a desk and filing cabinet are the only things left inside the room. the desk is covered in dust, but the cabinet has been left alone. there's a computer on the desk, with a single window open.

text.title: a text file
text.body:
a quick message is typed out on the screen.if you're reading this, please turn off the computer and leave. i know i'm a coward for leaving a message like this, but i'm afraid. i've been hearing voices at night, and i think they're coming from outside. i can't go out there. i don't know who or what is out there. i'm going to hide in the cabinet until they go away. if they find me, i don't know what they'll do. please, please turn off the computer and leave.
the file's properties reveal it was written about 200 years ago.

cabinet.title: the cabinet
cabinet.body: a pile of bones lie in the cabinet. maybe something else is hiding here.
